unnormalised: And talking about important dates, who can forget 15/08/1947? Independence Day, obviously! That's when we finally shook off the British Raj. Imagine the celebrations that must have happened all over India that day! My grandfather used to tell me stories of the jubilation and hope that filled the air back then. Plus, Gandhi Jayanti falls on 02/10 every year, a tribute to the Father of the Nation. These historical dates are reminders of our journey and the sacrifices made.
